Articles.Content:
I've noticed there isn't a lot of easter egg threads... Here discuss your findings, missions to find them, just easter eggs stuff.

Now I think there are things on planets it said they don't have them. There must be Easter eggs on seemingly "impossible" to land on bodies.
This is a good idea! I found one of the Munoliths in the Mun's.. East Crater I think, just yesterday. I had no intention of finding it, I was just doing a landing and noticed it, it was pretty cool!
SCANsat can help you find them, but it's up to you to get to them! Not all of them are in locations where you can just plop down a lander either. Good luck!

I've always wanted to see the

camera on Duna and the pyramids of Jeb-Ahn-Kah-Mun.

So far I've found the Armstrong Memorial and the Dead Kraken.... but the exact locations are classified... lol...

And I may have finally spotted Vallhenge. Not sure... but I saw something sparkling at almost 10,000 meters, way higher than any rock would show up. That's exactly how I found the other two. I did three orbits and it was there each time.... later I'll attempt to land next to whatever it is.
Hmm... I feel I need to provide a link to Anomaly Surveyor. Contracts for visiting all the Easter eggs, plus one very big bonus Easter egg introduced by the contract pack itself.

So far I've found the Armstrong Memorial and the Dead Kraken.... but the exact locations are classified... lol...

http://i.imgur.com/OZBtIUM.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/FWNbZsa.png

And I may have finally spotted Vallhenge. Not sure... but I saw something sparkling at almost 10,000 meters, way higher than any rock would show up. That's exactly how I found the other two. I did three orbits and it was there each time.... later I'll attempt to land next to whatever it is.

Prior to v1.0 I was on a quest to rover to all the Mun anomalies, but v1.0 came out and put an end to that. Since then, not even looking for anomalies, I lifted off from a Mun landing only to see the Mun Arch beneath me as I flew up and over a ridge ... didn't even know I was close to it (should have looked at my SCANsat lol).

SCANsat can help you find them, but it's up to you to get to them! Not all of them are in locations where you can just plop down a lander either. Good luck!

I definetly recommednt this mod. It gives you a map with Anomalie-markers where the EasterEggs are after you scanned the surface with a satelite.

I found Vallhenge the other day

I looked at the 2 locations on Tylo on KerbalMaps, but I didn't find anything. One's an underground cave or something I think, but I found nothing at either. Apparently there was a crater on Tylo with Carl Sagan's face in it, but it was removed at some point?

Edited September 10, 2015 by sj176

I've noticed there isn't a lot of easter egg threads... Here discuss your findings, missions to find them, just easter eggs stuff.

Now I think there are things on planets it said they don't have them. There must be Easter eggs on seemingly "impossible" to land on bodies.

Not a lot of easter egg threads? Are you freaking kidding me? I know you're new but did you even bother to search? A simple title search for 'easter egg' gives 4 pages of results. 100 individual threads!

One of the most complete lists is the "Easter Egg Stocktake 1.0.4": http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60551

I found an anomaly today

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/133937-MUN-Midlands-Anomaly

I found Vallhenge the other day

http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/704037719772518175/8D1A4A27322458094A30619711711D26A93651FC/

I looked at the 2 locations on Tylo on KerbalMaps, but I didn't find anything. One's an underground cave or something I think, but I found nothing at either. Apparently there was a crater on Tylo with Carl Sagan's face in it, but it was removed at some point?

I read somewhere the Tylo Easter eggs were removed... sorry.

Nice job on finding Vallhenge... I'm homing in on that one myself... I think.

Not a lot of easter egg threads? Are you freaking kidding me? I know you're new but did you even bother to search? A simple title search for 'easter egg' gives 4 pages of results. 100 individual threads!

One of the most complete lists is the "Easter Egg Stocktake 1.0.4": http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60551

Same deal here. Every week some noob comes by and says "I found [insert Easter egg here], is this bug".

I read somewhere the Tylo Easter eggs were removed... sorry.

Nice job on finding Vallhenge... I'm homing in on that one myself... I think.

The Cave on Tylo is currently Underground and Carl Sagan's Face is missing for quite some time now.

I read somewhere the Tylo Easter eggs were removed... sorry.

Nice job on finding Vallhenge... I'm homing in on that one myself... I think.

The Cave on Tylo is currently Underground and Carl Sagan's Face is missing for quite some time now.

According to my SCANsat of Tylo, there is one anomaly present. I've not been there so I can't tell you what it is.

The Cave on Tylo is currently Underground and Carl Sagan's Face is missing for quite some time now.

That's depressing. Just imagine looking down and seeing Carl Sagan looking up at you.

I actually found the Armstrong memorial on accident... I just happened to land about a kilometer from it. Never seen the Kraken though.

Others I'm aware of are the face on Duna and the arch.

I saw this thread and looked at the join dates of the first few posters. Kinda explained things a bit.......
What is old is new again, and everyone likes eastereggs.
